title: @Riot from a Zyra main... You have broken the last straw with me, and many other Zyra mains.
body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/04/red-post-collection-taric-update.html#3

[While the mid year mage updates are largely gameplay focused, Reav3 also commented Zyra will be receiving a texture update for her base skin and plants: "Quote: Will there be texture updates at least? Zyra needs one imo, she kinda looks like plastic right now. Zyra will have a texture update to her base only (and her base plants)" He continued: "Quote: Why isnt Wildfire Zyra a candidate for a small TU? Her current orange colour is a bit distracting since the new Summoners Rift imo A TU for Zyra takes quite a bit of time as she also has all those plant asset. We have pretty limited art resources for the roster projects and had to choose between only base Zyra or nothing at all. We chose to at least update base Zyra."]

Let me get this straight....

Its been how many years since riot legitimately did anything with Zyra? Let alone give her a skin. Sure I'm happy shes getting reworked, and yay shes getting her base model revamped....

But how come Shen gets the golden treatment with skins/spashart... the works... and you only commit half way with zyra... Her in game models are absolute SHIT. I have endured quite a bit of neglect from you. Why create a champion only to ignore her because "it takes too much time"?... Why invest in a champion when you have no intention of treating her just as fairly?


And then to add to the pile of salt I have built up, you preview the infernal Diana skin https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-20JEbfMqm_0/VwQZHz2oryI/AAAAAAAANDI/uTgXImIP13EQF9BWo15f_lWLR7lrCSgMw/s640/dianaturn.jpg

What a major slap in the face, holy shit... I'm sorry, I know I'm coming off rude and childish here... but lets be real here.... Infernal Diana was only known since All Stars.... Zyra rework has been known for much longer.... are you telling me that you are willing to make another skin just to ignore one you all ready made on a different champion just because you know Zyra is not as popular as Diana?....

I am livid, and pissed the hell off... At least give me some hope and say its being worked on and might take a bit longer after the rework, but to completely dismiss it is a huge mistake to a rather loyal player base.

If you don't believe me, go ahead and check out our Zyra mains reddit page.

replies.body: What gets me about the Inferal Diana is that at a glance, I thought it was an update to Zyra's skin.  Nope.  It's just what Zyra could have been.
Yep, it set me off rather hard
man I love getting downvoted for sharing my thoughts... feelsgoodman
Zyra already has a fire skin though...

Zyra is part of the mage update and none of the other mages will get any updates on their visuals(aside from new skills),even though some could really need them({{champion:8}} {{champion:90}} and even {{champion:69}}),so Zyra is already getting a special treatment here.

Also Zyra still looks way better than many other champs,she might be a bit outdated by todays standards,but others look much worse than her and the old Shen was one of them.

fair points in all honesty... but we are not even asking for splash changes (at least im not)... im just sick of being ignored and told "it takes to much time"...

Vlad and Malz have both received skins recently. Zyra hasn't in years and she's still getting her core skins ignored.

Malzahars last skin was in 2014,so I wouldn't call that recently(and Zyra also got her skt-skin in 2014,sure it is legacy,but the same goes for snowday malzahar)
Cassiopeia has it even worse,since her last skin was in 2013 and people seem to be under the impression that her texture update made her look worse than before.

And I mean at least there is a reason why Zyras skins take so long(since she uses new models in all of her skills,she is likely one of the most difficult champions when it comes to skins,the only other champ who has it worse seems to be Zac),but there isn't really an excuse for malzahar or cassiopeia.
Anyway,none of the champions selected for the mage update are likely to receive any new skins,since they will likely get new abilities.

About the SKT skins, it's not like they've done anything else for her besides giving her new clothes. Plants remain default, animations/abilities remain default. While you could argue that's standard for a 750 skin, looking at the other team skins, it just feels cheaply out of place. The likes of Zed/Sivir/Talon have completely new ability particles, Jax/Shen/Mundo have new sound effects, Thresh/Twitch have new recall animation... They could have easily given her plants/passive SKT themed colour by adding some yellow bits, or give her autos a different particle like Vayne's... but that isn't the case.

Well in the same way academy vlad is just vlad in different clothes.


And 750 skins only rarely get any new spell effects,most of them are more about fitting into the skin(for example zed carries skt-themed shurikens on his back so why would he throw regular ones?),the ones you mentioned are the exception not the rule.

> most of them are more about fitting into the skin

Exactly. I know that Zyra's plants aren't exaclty part of her base model, but it just feels extremely out of place that SKT Zyra uses Classic Zyra's plants and abilities.

I mean, SKT Jax got new auto-attack sounds to match his trophy ("thunk!") and SKT Vayne gets re-coloured bolts to match her gold crossbow. But no love for Zyra?

And what's even worse is that in the [SKT Splash Art, Zyra has red vines](http://i.imgur.com/dCsLWkX.jpg), but in-game the vines are green... Why would Riot bother making them red in the art, then just not even bother giving her a quick re-colour of her abilities?

The inconsistency just makes no sense!

The SKT T1 skin, and other professional League team skins, are irrelevant. I don't look at them as a particular perk towards a champion, and if you don't follow the teams, which a lot of us don't, then they mean next to nothing. Why would you walk around with a big logo on your champion if you don't follow esports or like that particular team? Those skins are less for the fans of the champions, and more for the fans of esports. 

It's just a regular Zyra base with an SKT T1 uniform. I don't think the 750 RP price has anything to do with it. Riot has shown us that they can make amazing high quality 750 RP skin that rivals some of their more expensive ones, look at Order of the Lotus Irelia that came out last year.

When I look at the new Diana skin I'm underwhelmed. Like someone else said here, it looks a lot like Wildfire Zyra, and I don't even like Wildfire Zyra. They're both pretty lackluster, and the similarity to Wildfire Zyra skin would be off putting if I played Diana. Both skins should be fixed, but again the concepts are pretty dull to begin with.

I think the regular excuses Riot throws out are wearing a little thin when it comes to Zyra. She arguably has the most potential gameplay and visual wise, but they never really tap into that.

I wanted to post a similar reply. Mostly because updating the texture on a champ skin doesn't mean you have to also update all the plants and stuff. I mean, nobody really gives a shit about the plants. They're already kind of ugly, and they have a short duration when they're not killed immediately, anyway. Plants take too long? Ok, then just ignore them and make the actual skin part of Wildfire not terrible.

My first thought about this Diana skin was "Great, first LeBlanc and Kha'zix get improved Zyra base skins, now Diana gets an improved Zyra wildfire skin." It is pretty irritating when other champs get skins that are basically better versions of you.

On the other hand, there are a lot of skins that share similar themes and aesthetics, so it seems pretty irrational to be like "wildfire Zyra looks like ass, so you can't make any new fire-themed skins that look better!"

I think the root issue is more that Zyra players are generally bitter as fuck about being a literal red-headed stepchild. When she's not nerfed, she's ignored. When she's not ignored, Riot just bullshits about her (that plant AI "buff" that was supposedly so strong it would need to be monitored...LOL). And now that she is getting some work, Riot is balancing her as support in the biggest "fuck you" I've ever seen. Then add to it that she hasn't had a non-esports skin (which Katey has said many times aren't counted in the rotation) since **October 2013.**

In the League of Mobility Creep, power creep, AD overlords, juggernauts, hypertank carries, and magic resist given out like mana from heaven, Zyra's still moving at 325 MS with junk-tier base stats, dumb-as-fuck plants, delays or animation locks on every ability, and is a "cc mage" whose cc is outclassed by half the roster. But yeah, better buff Lee Sin's ult since he wasn't pick/ban for 5 minutes.
I think you said it better honestly... I just wish riot would actually acknowledge us calling them out on this instead of being ignored over and over.

Yeah, and ignored on issues that actually matter. The Zyra main community isn't like Sona mains spamming conspiracy theories about how Riot hates our champ. 

Like after they "buffed" the plant AI, plants still weren't following the priority system posted by a rioter before the AI changes. They didn't actually fix the plant targeting issues, they just debugged plant behavior without fixing the fundamental problems with targeting.

And after multiple people's in-depth posts to the boards asking for clarification or a response, we got zilch. Meanwhile, Evelynn gets a mana cost on her W and a request for context turns into a goddam developer symposium.

Livid is the same as pissed the hell off. Not sure how you can be both. But regardless, there are totally different Riot employees that work on skins from the ChampUp team. Shen got a REWORK so he got new splashes and art because that's the quality that they are committing to with any rework. Zyra is getting attention in the MYMU for some of the gameplay issues she suffers from, and they are doing what the can to make progress on her one step at a time. She gets her base skin updated texture wise, but it is so much work to recolor and work on every texture she has to do her base, Wildfire, Haunted, and SKT if they felt all the skins needed changes. I think only her base and Wildfire look off from normal Riot quality, especially for a champ multiple years old. The fact that Infernal Diana is coming out doesn't mean they neglected Zyra in any way, there is no correlation there whatsoever.
Yea screw riot for operating like a business and not catering to you. Riot owes you nothing.

Since when do I have to be happy about how how a business runs? Tell me where it say's that as a paying customer I have no right to complain about the products I purchase from them. Tell me where it says that I'm not allowed to bitch about feeling neglected when I am paying them. I purchase their product, they don't purchase me.

Because, you expect something from them, but when it isn't given you complain, even when given no indication that it would happen. And the products you paid for, you paid for the current version. Not future versions, whenever they may arrive. Also, you can't complain, because you knew what you were buying. If you didn't that's your fault. Yo ... like seriously the thing that grinds your gears about zyra right now is how she looks? Bro I get the different strokes for different folks but as a ex zyra mid main since end of season 3 the way she looks should be the last thing on the list. Like I have sadly, bitterly and angrily watched over the seasons as Zyra has been nerfed into the state of a full support. I'm not calling something she should of originally has a buff (good ai on her plants) and even if I did recognize it as such it was just stripped away. I've made this post about Zyra needing help or needing buffs more times than I'd like to count. What the hell was the point of "reworking" her when she has to depend on such a random uncontrollable mechanic (passive) to be strong only for riot to nerf it and then nerf her damage once again and then nerf her ONCE AGAIN for a role that is a secondary one until she finally has been forcefully pushed into that role and is no longer viable mid? I really hope those that play and love Malhazar are watching because if you don't stop playing him support what Riot did to Zyra is going to happen to him. If you want him to stay a mage and not a support stop taking him bot. She was my favorite champ now I don't even look twice at her in champ select. Before the last patch I almost found a way to make mid zyra work but the patch took that away from me before I got a chance to experiment further. Zyra has low base speed, depends entirely on plants being nearby from passive to do any significant damage and is ridiculously, laughably squishy. Why does Riot hate her so much?

So I have literally been playing Zyra since the day she was released. She was the one champ I absolutely fell in love with before she was even released, enough to buy the bundle. And I never looked back. I've seen her go through a ton of changes: from being a powerful, over dominating mid later who one shots her opponents with her incredible burst, to the much needed nerfs, to being a not as viable mid laner, and then a pretty okay support. So of course, I was ecstatic about the rework. It was much needed and put my favorite champion back on the map again. But I repeatedly get frustrated  (and I think every Zyra main will agree with me) when I see champs that get skins pretty much every season, or already have a ton of skins, get another. Zyra only has two available year round, and the other is limited edition. I've been hoping now that she is more popular, she'll get a new skin, but who knows... She is long overdue for one. Come on, riot, show Zyra mains some love.
Has anyone even looked at Zyra's classic model? It's beautiful, her face is like the most well worked face in any model.
Agree 110%.
I want a new Zyra skin that emphasizes the tendrils theme. Maybe something like a Mermaid Zyra with seashells in her hair, and corals and suckered tentacles as her plants.
